A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Another failed attempt to win the hearts of Star Wars fans. The First Order is a weak parody of the Empire. Kylo is a sad mockery of a Sith Lord. Snoak is an failed attempt at a modern day Emperor. There were redeeming nostalgic moments\, but they were few and far between. Disney will continue to put out these movies and reap their cash rewards\, but there is truth to the saying that you can't go home again. A valiant effort\, but the attempts at humor were impotent more often than not. A lack of detailed explanations regarding new character backgrounds\, bland characters (Rose\, Finn\, and Poe just to name a few) a near complete disregard for the original characters (Chewie\, C-3PO\, and R2- D2) along with uninspired\, unnecessary and meandering plot threads doomed this movie to cinematic mediocrity. That being said\, it was still better than The Force Awakens.
